subject: Stunts and Stuntmen
Parachutes and Parachute Jumping
lead_paragraph: Gary Connery, a stunt diver from Britain, jumped from a helicopter and became the first person to complete a successful wing-suit landing without using a parachute.
snippet: Gary Connery, a stunt diver from Britain, jumped from a helicopter and became the first person to complete a successful wing-suit landing without using a parachute.
